Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People today are talking about a range of issues. There are growing calls for an increase in JobSeeker payments responses to reports of welfare recommendations from the government and a major rescue operation off the coast of Western Australia to save stranded fishermen. Meanwhile there's a debate brewing over whether the Reserve Bank of New Zealand is taking sufficient action to alleviate the effects of the pandemic on the economy. Investors are keeping a close eye on events as the Australian share market fluctuates in response to announcements from the Reserve Bank.
